messages.content: I understand and you're making my point
Understood. If you want, I can focus on the key takeaways from that coverage.
could you please summarize all the top headings for today

Top headlines today: Leafs lose to Bruins; Minten scores in Bruins win; Indigenous veterans day ceremonies; Toronto adds winter shelter spaces; Ontario property tax funding debate; Vaughan fatal crash sentencing; Ottawa immigration woes; Telus fibre expansion; COP30 Canada role; Paris Agreement critique; Canucks seek consecutive wins; Regina accessibility parks; Avalanche hot start; Nield helps Riders to Grey Cup; infant formula recalls.
tell me more about the Ottawa immigration woes
Ottawa immigration woes: families of mass stabbing victims face stalled cases; federal help sought for delays, coverage, and processing to reunite or resettle affected relatives.
Please provide a summary of the top 2 stories you think I may be interested in.
Ottawa immigration delays harming families of victims; federal help urged for processing, coverage, reunification. Ontario cities say funding gaps risk 2026 property tax hikes.
Any tech news listed? If so how many articles
Yes. There are 2 tech-related articles.
what other kind of Articles do you have just tell me what kind of category you would place them in
Categories: Politics/Policy, local Canadian news; Infrastructure/Technology; Crime; Sports; Economy/Finance; Community/Human interest; Regional/City news; Education/Housing.
can you give me a really brief summary of the two Tech articles
Two tech pieces: Telus fibre expansion across Ontario/Quebec; 3D-printed, net-zero student housing at Windsor.
how about in politics
Here are the politics stories: Ontario minister pursues defense industry investments and jobs; Ontario weighs changes to college/university funding formula.
Hi there
Hi! How can I help with the news today?
Yes, how many tech related headlines do you count?
Two tech-related headlines.
